intension: Create a beautiful and romantic flyer to advertise a calligraphy workshop. The flyer should feature flowers and leaves as decoration, and include important information such as the date, location, and registration details. Contact information for registration is participant@writeit.us or 87-211-433-2122.

keywords: art, bloom, calligraphy, decoration, floral, flowers, frame, leaves, romantic, workshop, flyer

bglayer.bgcaption: The image is a white background with a black line running through the middle of it. The background is completely white, and the black line appears to be a horizontal line. The simplicity of the image suggests that it could be used as a placeholder or a minimalist design element

body.text: Seats are limited, please register in advance
